main: ^My name is John. I hunt dangerous creatures in different worlds. My last hunt lasted three years. During that time, I left my daughter with a portal keeper I know. When I returned home, I found the portal keeper dead and my daughter gone.
^I am now making my way through the wild world to one of the portal keepers who, according to my sources, is able to help me find her, despite his shady reputation...
^USE "WASD" TO MOVE, "LEFT MOUSE BUTTON" TO SHOOT, "SPACEBAR" TO DASH
